summary: Completed comprehensive testing of shaï's company landing page. All major features working correctly including hero section, music label, AI modules with status badges, NotiaNote education, crypto ecosystem, formations, transparency section with glassmorphism, and footer with correct email.
passed_tests: Backend health check endpoint returns 200 with correct response
Hero section loads with logo, title 'shaï's company', subtitle, and clickable explore button
Music section displays studio image and clickable 'Visit the Label' button
AI Modules section shows 4 cards with correct status badges (Active: 2, Development: 8, Experimental: 2)
NotiaNote section has 'In Development' badge and 'Discover NotiaNote' button
Crypto section has all 4 cards: Hexyra, Portfolio Tracker, Crypto Formation, TradingView Indicator with status badges
Formations section displays 3 cards as expected
Transparency section with glassmorphism effect shows status explanations with proper blur effect
Footer displays correct email dontbyshai@gmail.com and 8 project links
All 12 buttons and cards are clickable and interactive
Dark theme with cyan accents properly implemented

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All sections, badges, buttons, and interactions working correctly
